<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/tensorspec-h">llvm/Analysis/TensorSpec.h</a>&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/include/llvm/analysis/utils/traininglogger-h">llvm/Analysis/Utils/TrainingLogger.h</a>&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#include &lt;system&#95;error&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="comment">/// A MLModelRunner that asks for advice from an external agent, or host. It</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="comment">/// uses 2 files - ideally named pipes - one to send data to that agent, and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="comment">/// one to receive advice.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The data exchange uses the training logger (Utils/TrainingLogger.h) format.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Specifically, the compiler will send the log header, set the context, and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">/// send observations; the host is expected to reply with a tensor value after</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">/// each observation as a binary buffer that&#39;s conforming to the shape of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">/// advice. Interleaved, the data closely resembles the training log for a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">/// log where we don&#39;t capture the reward signal.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Note that the correctness of the received data is the responsibility of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">/// host. In particular, if insufficient data were sent, the compiler will block</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">/// when waiting for an advice.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Note that the host can either open the pipes RW, or open first the pipe to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the compiler - i.e. the &quot;Inbound&quot; - and then the &quot;Outbound&quot;, to avoid</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">/// deadlock. This is because the compiler first tries to open the inbound</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">/// (which will hang until there&#39;s a writer on the other end).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/interactivemodelrunner"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/interactivemodelrunner/#a82ed5b95e51fbe7344411033a06329be">InteractiveModelRunner</a> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mlmodelrunner/#ad3a2236255bf0a1c90006508a28a21fd">MLModelRunner</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> R-&gt;getKind() == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mlmodelrunner/#a81819d92a6045c9191f144ca86044b35a24b9b8c0634a40138e76b2fb86894698">MLModelRunner::Kind::Interactive</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/interactivemodelrunner/#acd24bb7114ceab6169ea9569b8037370"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/interactivemodelrunner/#acd24bb7114ceab6169ea9569b8037370">switchContext</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> override </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="normal">    Log-&gt;switchContext(Name);</Highlight></CodeLine>
